private_settings.name: variables
private_settings.title: Custom Variables
private_settings.description: Define custom variables here. usually things you don't want to save in the Connector's code, such as API Keys, or values you want to allow non-technical users to be able to update. A variable you define as `foo` Will be available as `variables.foo` in the code editor. Only Strings are supported here

private_settings.name: sync_interval
private_settings.title: Check every:
private_settings.description: Interval in minutes between checks for new data in Phantombuster

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.description: The Phantombuster API Key. [See how to find it here](https://support.phantombuster.com/hc/en-001/articles/360010229440-How-to-find-my-API-key)
private_settings.title: API Key

private_settings.name: code
private_settings.title: Code
private_settings.description: Enter Javascript code here, It will receive the data in the middle column, can emit `track()` and `traits()`. Preview results on the right. Save when finished

settings_sections.title: Credentials
settings_sections.description: Configure Phantombuster. After you have entered the key, hit Save on the top right of the page, and RELOAD the current page to configure the Phantom to fetch

settings_sections.title: Configuration
settings_sections.description: Select the Phantom to fetch, and at which frequency

settings_sections.title: Configuration
settings_sections.description: Configure custom variables to pass to the connector (optional)

json.title: Trigger Phantom
json.name: run
json.description: Run Phantom Now - Check on Phantombuster to see Progress

confirm.text: You are about to trigger a Phantom on Phantombuster. Confirm?
